THERE IS A SLGT RISK OF SVR TSTMS TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 40 W
RHI 20 W VOK 35 ESE ALO OXV 35 ENE SDA OMA TQE OTG 30 W BRD 20 SW
HIB BFW IWD 40 W RHI.

THERE IS A MRGL RISK OF SVR TSTMS TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 90 ENE
CMX 35 NE ESC MTW 20 WNW MKE IRK OJC 30 NW EMP RSL 50 ENE HLC HSI
OFK FSD VVV FAR GFK 40 NW HCO.

GEN TSTMS ARE FCST TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 60 SSE LBX 40 S CLL
15 WNW MWL 25 SE SPS 10 ENE OKC 25 WNW CQB 30 E END 10 N END 15 S
GAG 55 NNW CDS 40 WSW LBB 35 SSW INK 110 SW 6R6 ...CONT... 95 SSW
GBN 45 E YUM 20 ESE BLH 40 NNE BLH 60 N IGM 20 E 4HV 30 W CAG 25 N
CAG 25 WNW CDR 35 NNE CDR 20 NNW PHP 50 SE BIS 45 NE BIS 45 ESE MOT
35 NE MOT 80 N MOT ...CONT... 55 NW EFK 15 SSW UCA 35 SE BFD 15 NNE
HLG 35 NNW CMH 35 WSW FDY 25 S JXN 20 E LAN 15 S MBS MBS 30 W MBS 35
NNE GRR 20 E MKG 25 WSW MMO 35 NNE COU 30 WSW TBN 15 ESE FLP 65 WSW
